room_title: Escape room "The Ship" by Escape Room Louisiana in Lake Charles
review: Incredible room and incredible owners. We had a fantastic time doing the Ship room. Completely immersive, you feel like you are literally in a ship. We can't wait to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Ship" by Escape Room Louisiana in Lake Charles
review: Still have a grin on my face! Great experience and super staff! Awesome work on the room! Shout out to my fellow pirates, great escaping with all of you!

room_title: Escape room "The Ship" by Escape Room Louisiana in Lake Charles
review: This was awesome, very well done!! We did the Ship. The puzzles and riddles were very thought provoking and challenging enough to keep us on our toes the whole time!

room_title: Escape room "The Ship" by Escape Room Louisiana in Lake Charles
review: We boarded the ship and managed to escape. I think our crew had a great time and we will definitely be back! Thanks Tod!

room_title: Escape room "The Ship" by Escape Room Louisiana in Lake Charles
review: We just finished The Ship. Only had 4 minutes left when we escaped. This place is awesome and so are the people who run it. You will not be disappointed!
